fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.interfaces.CombinatorI

  • Packages that use CombinatorI 
    Package Description
    fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.combinators

    • Uses of CombinatorI in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.combinators

      Classes in fr.sorbonne_u.cps.replication.combinators that implement CombinatorI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FixedCombinator<T>
      The class FixedCombinator implements a combinator of results that selects a given result each time it is called.
      class  LoneCombinator<T>
      The class IdentityCombinator implements a combinator of results that selects the unique result each time it is called.
      class  MajorityVoteCombinator<T>
      The class MajorityVoteCombinator implements a combinator of results that selects a the result that appears the most often in among the ones passed each time it is called.
      class  RandomCombinator<T>
      The class RandomCombinator implements a combinator of results that randomly selects a result each time it is called.
